00009 CloseDialog::CloseDialog() : QDialog(0)
00010 {
00011     setCaption("Close Client");
00012 
00013     vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00014     vBoxLayout->setMargin(5);
00015     vBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00016 
00017     label = new QLabel("<nobr>There are entries in the journal which have not been saved and cleared.</nobr><br>"
00018                        "<nobr>Would you like to save and clear these entries now?</nobr><br><br>"
00019                        "Note: if you do not save and clear these entries, "
00020                        "they will <u>not</u> be lost.  You will find them "
00021                        "in the same place when you open this client again.", this);
00022 
00023     vBoxLayout->addWidget(label);
00024     vBoxLayout->addSpacing(10);
00025 
00026     hBoxLayout = new QHBoxLayout(vBoxLayout);
00027     hBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00028 
00029     saveButton = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/saveAndClear.png")),
00030                                  "Save and Clear Entries", this);
00031     connect(saveButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(saveAndClear()));
00032 
00033     dontSaveButton = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png")),
00034                                      "Don't Save and Clear", this);
00035     connect(dontSaveButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(dontSave()));
00036 
00037     returnButton = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/return.png")),
00038                                    "Return to Journal Entry", this);
00039     connect(returnButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(retToEntry()));
00040 
00041     hBoxLayout->addStretch();
00042     hBoxLayout->addWidget(saveButton);
00043     hBoxLayout->addWidget(dontSaveButton);
00044     hBoxLayout->addWidget(returnButton);
00045 }
